name: Elyseus
description:
This game was made in 48h for Ludum Dare 30 with the theme "Connected worlds"

Elyseus is an unruly and bald warrior. He was cursed to battle forever in this strange temple. Fight hordes of undead in the overworld. If you die, you will be taken to the underworld where you can harvest the souls of the damned to return to life. But beware! They will try to siphon what's left of your essence... If that happens, who knows what your fate will be.
